data.name: smile-detector-app
data.description: Smile Detection which is developed in Python. This Project is designed using and OpenCV (HaarCascade Algorithm). This Project autodetects the smiling faces in the webcam which is opened during the program runs.

data.name: Conqueror
data.description: Project Conqueror designed using Linux Kernel. It is the project based on Operating System. It comes under low level development. Conqueror is Open Source Project and have lot's of Contributors. This Project is designed using C, x86_64 Assembly, Makefile.

data.name: amazon-clone
data.description: This is a Clone website of amazon.com. This website is created using React JS. It displays the items list, you can add them to your cart and later you can delete them from the cart. It has a real time login data. The real cash payment is fetched from stripe.com.

data.name: Voice-Assist-AI
data.description: Virtual Voice Assistant in Python. It performs operations such as web browsing, searching information in wikipedia, reminder, age calculation, email transactions. The libraries used in this is Speech_Recognition, pyttsx3, webbrowser, etc..
